descriptionMarkdown:
You can use it to monitor the throughput of your base.

The way it works is by sampling the production at specific intervals and taking the average. For instance, in this posted version it is configured to measure the average of the last 5 minutes and emit an alert if it is less than 118/m of yellow packs.

It is very easy to setup: you hook a wire to the input of the rightmost arithmetic combinator and set the input signal you want to monitor, then you open the constant combinator and change the X signal to the amount per minute that is your target. I recommend using a value a bit lower than your target to prevent it from alerting when it drops temporarily because of random fluctuations in production. Then configure the alert you want on the programmable speaker at the alert settings.

Motivation: I generally have several small bases, instead of a huge one, so it becomes crucial to monitor the production of each base individually, so you can identify quickly which base needs attention.
title: Production monitor
